Column.Name: IsValidCertificateWithPriviateKey
Column.LambdaExpression: CertificateRequest, Status, HasPrivateKey=> String.IsNullOrEmpty(String(@0[CertificateRequest])) and CertificateStatus(EnumObject(@0[Status]).Value) == CertificateStatus.Valid and Boolean(@0[HasPrivateKey])

Column.Name: CanExportCertificate
Column.LambdaExpression: CertificateRequest, Status, HasPrivateKey, PrivateKeyExportable=> String.IsNullOrEmpty(String(@0[CertificateRequest])) and CertificateStatus(EnumObject(@0[Status]).Value) == CertificateStatus.Valid and Boolean(@0[HasPrivateKey]) and Boolean(@0[PrivateKeyExportable])

Column.Name: DistributionMechanism
Column.LambdaExpression: PublicFolderDistributionEnabled, WebDistributionEnabled, PublicFoldersDistributionMechanism, WebBasedDistributionMechanism, WebBasedAndPublicFolderDistributionMechanism=> iif(Boolean(@0[PublicFolderDistributionEnabled]), iif(Boolean(@0[WebDistributionEnabled]), Strings.WebBasedAndPublicFolderDistributionMechanism.ToString(), Strings.PublicFoldersDistributionMechanism.ToString()), iif(Boolean(@0[WebDistributionEnabled]), Strings.WebBasedDistributionMechanism.ToString(), String.Empty))

Column.Name: CanSuspend
Column.LambdaExpression: Status => RequestStatus(WinformsHelper.ParseRequestStatus(@0[Status].ToString())) != RequestStatus.AutoSuspended and RequestStatus(WinformsHelper.ParseRequestStatus(@0[Status].ToString())) != RequestStatus.CompletionInProgress and RequestStatus(WinformsHelper.ParseRequestStatus(@0[Status].ToString())) != RequestStatus.Completed and RequestStatus(WinformsHelper.ParseRequestStatus(@0[Status].ToString())) != RequestStatus.CompletedWithWarning and RequestStatus(WinformsHelper.ParseRequestStatus(@0[Status].ToString())) != RequestStatus.Suspended and RequestStatus(WinformsHelper.ParseRequestStatus(@0[Status].ToString())) != RequestStatus.Failed

Column.Name: CanEnableArchive
Column.LambdaExpression:
RecipientType, RecipientTypeDetails, ArchiveState, ExchangeVersion=> ExchangeObjectVersion(@0["ExchangeVersion"]).CompareTo(ExchangeObjectVersion.Exchange2010) >= 0 and ArchiveState(@0["ArchiveState"]) == ArchiveState.None and ((RecipientType(@0["RecipientType"]) == RecipientType.UserMailbox and RecipientTypeDetails(@0["RecipientTypeDetails"]) != RecipientTypeDetails.LegacyMailbox) or
(RecipientTypeDetails(@0["RecipientTypeDetails"]) == RecipientTypeDetails.RemoteUserMailbox or RecipientTypeDetails(@0["RecipientTypeDetails"]) == RecipientTypeDetails.RemoteRoomMailbox or RecipientTypeDetails(@0["RecipientTypeDetails"]) == RecipientTypeDetails.RemoteEquipmentMailbox or RecipientTypeDetails(@0["RecipientTypeDetails"]) == RecipientTypeDetails.RemoteSharedMailbox))
